fr.umlv.escape.file

Class ParseFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.file.ParseFile

  • public class ParseFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Supplies some functions to parse a text file. Creating a ParseFile Object just initialize the stream on the file path given. All the content file is loaded in memory on the first use of a function. When the file content is loaded, the stream is closed. Data will be accessed directly in memory. DO NOT use a ParseFile object with big files.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset to the beginning. The next call to the getNextLine() function will return the first line of the file.
